name: jquery.iframe
description: jQuery plugin that creates inline iframes to isolate certain blocks of HTML.

scripts.clean: npm run clean-dist && npm run clean-lib
scripts.build: npm run build-commonjs & npm run build-umd
scripts.start: npm run watch-commonjs & npm run watch-umd
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
